meta.name: Circus Ex Mortis Campaign Expansion
meta.description: The New Moon Circus has come to Arkham, offering fun and wonder for all. But when Minnie Klein of the Arkham Advertiser comes to you with the circus’ checkered past, you are thrown into the secrets and horrors behind the curtain. Unravel the mystery in this 8-scenario campaign.
meta.author: The Beard

cards.name: One Night Only
cards.text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X.  X is equal to the number of [[Creature]] enemies in play.
[cultist]: -2.  If you fail, move once toward the nearest The Big Top location.
[elder_thing]: -1.  -3 instead if this is a test against a [[Creature]] enemy.

cards.name: One Night Only
cards.text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X.  X is equal to 1 + the number of [[Creature]] enemies in play.
[cultist]: -3.  Move once toward the nearest The Big Top location.
[elder_thing]: -2.  -4 instead if this is a test against a [[Creature]] enemy.

cards.flavor: One by one, the circus animals mutate into horrible forms.  Horns and tentacles, eyes and mouths all manifest by the dozen, each new mutation sparking fresh screams of terror from the crowd.  As the horrible beasts advance on the spectators, the human performers single out and grab people, quickly binding them and hauling them out of the tent.  It doesn't take much imagination to think of their plans here.
cards.name: The True Face
Two by Two
cards.text:
Another discordant trumpet rattles the air as a second elephantine horror bursts forth, trampling and goring with its twisted horns.
Spawn the set-aside Disguised Monstrosity at any copy of The Big Top.

cards.flavor: The minutes lengthen as the violence and abduction continue unabated.  The chaos has not lessened a bit, and more horrors unleash by the second.  What is it all amounting to?
cards.name: House of Horrors
By the Light of the Moon
cards.text:
The sparse clouds across the sky give the moon an appearance of flickering, but each time it does, the illusory magic strengthens like a surging tide. It's a struggle just to keep your wits about you.
In player order, each investigator must either discard half the cards in their hand (rounded up) or search the chaos bag for a token and seal it on their investigator card.

cards.flavor: Though lit by the full moon, your vision grows blurry at the edges and the sounds of the terrified din gradually dull around you.  Is the magic affecting your own perceptions now?  You had best escape before you fall under their spell.
cards.name: Mesmeric Magic
Spellbound
cards.text:
Your droning perceptions erode your focus, and teetering on the edge of sleep, your feet slow to a standstill. You are transfixed, unable to think of anything but the spectacle of color and sound around you... and yet you stand. Your mind has battled the influence to a stalemate. For cloudy moments, you continue standing, until at the edge of your hearing, two rough voices call out. "Hey, this one's still standing!" "Not for long, they aren't." THUNK.
Each investigator who has not resigned is defeated and suffers a physical or mental trauma (choose one).

cards.flavor: As you spring up to defend yourself and the unfortunate crowd, a question rises to the front of your mind.  If the circus was so careful to set this trap, would they allow the chance of some victims escaping?  You glance out the entrance to the tent and curse inwardly at the sight of a towering iron fence surrounding the circus grounds completely.  It could be real, or another illusion, like the disguising of the circus monsters.  You must find a way to escape!
cards.name: Rats in a Cage
In the Lion's Den
cards.text:
It becomes apparent from the crowd alone that the entrance is not simply hidden, but gone altogether. Whatever magic was used must have physically altered the circus wall, but that also means that like the monsters, the enchantment must have been applied directly to it. You scour the circus grounds, fending off the attackers and helping those you can, until at last you uncover the hidden source. A dark and smoky orb lies nestled in an out-of-the-way corner.
Attach the set-aside Illusory Locus to Animal Cages. Add a [tablet] token to the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.

cards.flavor: As you spring up to defend yourself and the unfortunate crowd, a question rises to the front of your mind.  If the circus was so careful to set this trap, would they allow the chance of some victims escaping?  You glance out the entrance to the tent and curse inwardly at the sight of a towering iron fence surrounding the circus grounds completely.  It could be real, or another illusion, like the disguising of the circus monsters.  You must find a way to escape!
cards.name: Rats in a Cage
In the Horse's Eye
cards.text:
It becomes apparent from the crowd alone that the entrance is not simply hidden, but gone altogether. Whatever magic was used must have physically altered the circus wall, but that also means that like the monsters, the enchantment must have been applied directly to it. You scour the circus grounds, fending off the attackers and helping those you can, until at last you uncover the hidden source. A dark and smoky orb lies nestled in an out-of-the-way corner.
Attach the set-aside Illusory Locus to Carousel. Add a [tablet] token to the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.

If the circus was so careful to set this trap, would they allow the chance of some victims escaping?  You glance out the entrance to the tent and curse inwardly at the sight of a towering iron fence surrounding the circus grounds completely.  It could be real, or another illusion, like the disguising of the circus monsters.  You must find a way to escape!

In the Prize Display

Whatever magic was used must have physically altered the circus wall, but that also means that like the monsters, the enchantment must have been applied directly to it. You scour the circus grounds, fending off the attackers and helping those you can, until at last you uncover the hidden source. A dark and smoky orb lies nestled in an out-of-the-way corner.
Attach the set-aside Illusory Locus to Games Gallery. Add a [cultist] token to the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.

If the circus was so careful to set this trap, would they allow the chance of some victims escaping?  You glance out the entrance to the tent and curse inwardly at the sight of a towering iron fence surrounding the circus grounds completely.  It could be real, or another illusion, like the disguising of the circus monsters.  You must find a way to escape!
cards.name: Rats in a Cage
In the Makeup Case
cards.text:
It becomes apparent from the crowd alone that the entrance is not simply hidden, but gone altogether. Whatever magic was used must have physically altered the circus wall, but that also means that like the monsters, the enchantment must have been applied directly to it. You scour the circus grounds, fending off the attackers and helping those you can, until at last you uncover the hidden source. A dark and smoky orb lies nestled in an out-of-the-way corner.
Attach the set-aside Illusory Locus to Performer Trailers. Add a [cultist] token to the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.

cards.flavor: The smoky marble embedded near the fence seems impervious to damage.  There must be some other way to dispel the enchantment, but what is the key?
cards.name: Smoke and Mirrors
cards.text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Release a token sealed on your investigator card. (Limit once per round.) Objective - If there are 2[per_investigator] or more clues on Illusory Locus, advance.

cards.name: Scientific Method
cards.text:
You scrutinize the orb carefully, and notice that whenever clouds cover or uncover the moon, the illusions around you fluctuate. Though equally strong when the moon is visible or not, the spell must account for the changing visibility, like the alternating current of electricity. By applying direct pressure on the orb only when the moonlight is changing, you stress the magic, until at last the bauble cracks. The illusions around you waver, and at the north end of the circus grounds, the entryway reappears!
Remove Illusory Locus from the game. Put the set-aside Circus Gates (Path to Freedom) into play.

cards.flavor: The circus exit is visible!  Seize the chance to escape before further complications arise!
cards.name: Out and Away
cards.text: [action] Choose and discard 2 cards from your hand: Release a token sealed on your investigator card. Objective - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

cards.name: Unenchanted
cards.text:
You waste little time in rushing through the circus gates to freedom, alongside as many of the other trapped spectators as you can find. If you never see the New Moon Circus again, it will be too soon.
(→R2)

cards.flavor:
The illusory power still tries to keep you
from escaping the clutches of the circus.
cards.name: Circus Gates
cards.text: [action] If there are no tokens sealed on your investigator card: Resign. You escape the illusion isolating the circus.

cards.flavor:
It almost looks too good to be true,
but this is no illusion.
cards.name: Circus Gates
Illusory Locus
cards.text: [action]: Reveal 4 random tokens from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [bless] or [curse] token, ignore it and reveal another token. Investigators at your location may spend any amount of clues as a group to reveal 4 additional tokens for each clue spent. For each token revealed, add 1 clue to Illusory Locus from the token bank. Any investigator at the attached location may activate this ability.

cards.name: Disguised Monstrosity
cards.text: Hunter. Massive. If Disguised Monstrosity's location is revealed and there are no clues on it, Disguised Monstrosity gets -1 fight and each successful attack against it deals +1 damage. Forced - After Disguised Monstrosity moves to a revealed location with no clues on it: Exhaust it.

cards.flavor:
The thing that was masquerading as a circus lion
has now shown its true face.
cards.name: Grotesque Lion
cards.text:
Hunter.
Grotesque Lion gets +1 fight and -1 evade during the round that it entered play.

cards.name: Maddening Spectacle
cards.text: Revelation - Put Maddening Spectacle into play in your threat area. You get -1 skill value to your highest skill. (If 2 or more skills would be your highest skill, choose one of them when this card enters play). [action]: Test any other skill (3). If you succeed, discard Maddening Spectacle.

cards.flavor: He definitely wasn't hired for his personality.
cards.name: New Moon Drudge
cards.text:
Hunter.
While New Moon Drudge is ready, investigators at its location cannot activate abilities printed on scenario cards.

cards.name: The Primrose Path
cards.text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -X. X is equal to the number of locations connected to Circus Encampment. [cultist]: -3. If there are no tokens sealed on your investigator card, lose an action. [tablet]: -2. If there are 1 or more tokens sealed on your investigator card, lose an action. [elder_thing]: -2. If a token was revealed during this test, it automatically fails instead.

cards.name: The Primrose Path
cards.text: Hard / Expert [skull]: -X. X is equal to 1 + the number of locations connected to Circus Encampment. [cultist]: -4. If there are no tokens sealed on your investigator card, lose an action. [tablet]: -3. If there are 1 or more tokens sealed on your investigator card, lose an action. [elder_thing]: -4. If a token was revealed during this test, it automatically fails instead.

cards.flavor: While you must contend with the illusions saturating the woods, you wish that was the worst of your problems.  Bestial howls and the sounds of disturbed underbrush echo around you, and far too close for your liking.  If the circus has also loosed their monsters to stalk the woods, you're in for a grueling time.
cards.name: Savage Nature
cards.text: Adjacent copies of Moonlit Forest are connected to each other.

cards.name: Never Revealed
cards.text:
Amid your struggles to navigate the woods, you keep an eye frequently trained on the lights of the distant circus camp. Looking this time however, the silhouette of a lone figure briefly obscures it before vanishing from view. Your meddling with the illusions has not gone unnoticed.
Spawn the set-aside New Moon Illusionist at Circus Encampment.

cards.flavor: With the circus taking active measures to keep you from your goal, there's only so long you can simply keep the opposing forces at stalemate.  With each passing moment, a new frenzied cry bellows through the woods, marking another creature out for your blood.
cards.name: Blood Moon
cards.text: Adjacent copies of Moonlit Forest are connected to each other.

cards.name: Feeding the Young
cards.text:
Another cry cracks through the air, but one far less familiar than before. Truly monstrous being shamble through the foliage, snapping trees and crumpling terrain as they gallop toward you. Mouths, tentacles and hooves strike at you as you flee for your life desperately into the forest.
Each investigator is defeated and suffers a physical or mental trauma (choose one).

cards.name: Lady Esprit
cards.text: [action] Exhaust Lady Esprit and deal her 1 horror: Heal 2 damage or gain 2 resources. Any investigator at Lady Esprit's location may activate this ability. [reaction] After you release a token: Discover a clue. (Limit once per round.)

cards.flavor: No matter what angle you approach the camp from, the lights stay the same distance away.  There must be a way to dispel the illusions.
cards.name: Forest of Illusion
cards.text: [free] If you are at a [[Woods]] location, investigators spend 1[per_investigator] clues as a group: Treat your location's printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]] and Victory X) for the remainder of the game. (Place a horror on the location as a reminder.) Objective - If each undefeated investigator is at Circus Encampment, you may advance.

cards.name: Carefully on Tiptoe Stealing
cards.text:
By learning and gradually unworking the illusions spread throughout the forest, you finally approach the outskirts of the circus camp. No alarm appears to have been raised, so you proceed with stifled breaths and careful movements.
(→R2)

cards.flavor: Don't let the path out of your sight.
cards.name: Forest Passage
cards.text: [free] Place 1[per_investigator] of your clues on Forest Passage: Look at the revealed side of any copy of Moonlit Forest.

cards.flavor:
A single beaten path winds through the trees,
sometimes breaking off for yards at a time.
cards.name: Forest Passage

cards.flavor:
This house is too old and derelict to have been set up
by the circus, but it still exudes an air of malice.
cards.name: Remote Cabin
cards.text:
Remote Cabin is connected to the three rightmost copies of Moonlit Forest, and vice versa.
As an additional cost to move from Remote Cabin to a non-[[Woods]] location, place 1 doom on a card you control.

cards.flavor:
An abandoned house lies nestled in the nearby woods,
but protected from approach by the magic around it.
cards.name: Remote Cabin
cards.text:
Remote Cabin is connected to the three rightmost copies of Moonlit Forest, and vice versa.
Investigators cannot enter Remote Cabin while there is fewer than 2 damage on it.

cards.flavor:
It is impractical, even risky, to navigate from
this cliffside anywhere but back into the forest.
cards.name: Woodland Overlook
cards.text:
Woodland Overlook is connected to the three leftmost copies of Moonlit Forest, and vice versa.
As an additional cost to move from Woodland Overlook to a non-[[Woods]] location, discard a non-weakness asset you control.

cards.flavor: A single cliff rises above the treeline.  It would be a great vantage point if you can find a way up to it.
cards.name: Woodland Overlook
cards.text:
Woodland Overlook is connected to the three leftmost copies of Moonlit Forest, and vice versa.
Investigators cannot enter Woodland Overlook while there is fewer than 2 damage on it.

cards.flavor: At last, the path is unobstructed.
cards.name: Circus Encampment
cards.text: [reaction] When you end your turn at Circus Encampment: Release any amount of tokens sealed on your investigator card.

cards.flavor:
The distant lights of the circus tents are clearly visible,
so why does every route lead away from it?
cards.name: Circus Encampment
cards.text: Investigators cannot enter Circus Encampment while there are fewer than 5 locations connected to it.

cards.name: Moonlit Forest
cards.text: Forced - After you reveal this location: Place 1 damage on Remote Cabin. As an additional cost to move from this location to any other [[Woods]] location, search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and spawn it engaged with you. (It does not make attacks of opportunity.) Shuffle the encounter deck if it was searched.

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
Moonlit Forest
cards.text: Forced - After you reveal this location: Place 1 damage on Remote Cabin. As an additional cost to move from this location to any other [[Woods]] location, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Hex]] treachery and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck if it was searched.

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
Moonlit Forest
cards.text: Forced - After you reveal this location: Place 1 damage on Woodland Overlook. As an additional cost to move from this location to any other [[Woods]] location, choose and discard a card from your hand and lose a resource.

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
Moonlit Forest
cards.text: Forced - After you reveal this location: Place 1 damage on Woodland Overlook. As an additional cost to move from this location to any other [[Woods]] location, search the token bag for a token and seal it on your investigator card.

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest

cards.flavor:
Your stomach convulses and you feel the first
ghastly pangs of hunger.
cards.name: Curse of the Rougarou
cards.text: Revelation - Put Curse of the Rougarou into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you have not dealt any damage this turn: Take 1 horror. [reaction] After you release a token: Discard Curse of the Rougarou.

cards.flavor: A particularly strong enchantment lingers in the grove.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
cards.text:
This location loses its moon connection symbol.
You cannot activate the [free] ability on the act at this location while there are 1 or more clues on this location.

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest

cards.flavor: You dare not follow the lights in this marshy ground.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
cards.text: This location loses its moon connection symbol. As an additional cost to activate the [free] ability on the act at this location, search the chaos bag for a token and seal it on your investigator card.

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest

cards.flavor: As unsettling as the full moon is, worse still is its absence.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
cards.text: This location and each adjacent copy of Moonlit Forest gain "Forced - After you end your turn at this location, if there are no tokens sealed on your investigator card: Take 1 horror."

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest

cards.flavor: Thick fog spills over from this low valley into nearby regions.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
cards.text: This location gets +2 shroud value.  Each adjacent copy of Moonlit Forest gets +1 shroud value.

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest

cards.flavor: All roads lead to the middle of nowhere.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
cards.text: Forced - When an investigator at an adjacent copy of Moonlit Forest moves to a location other than this location: That investigator discards a card from their hand at random.

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest

cards.flavor: An air of decay permeates the surrounding area.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
cards.text: Each token revealed at this location and each adjacent copy of Moonlit Forest gains "Take 1 damage."

cards.flavor: Blanched by the moonlight, the details of each tree blend together and give opportunities to lurking threats.
cards.name: Moonlit Forest
New Moon Illusionist
cards.text:
Hunter.  Aloof.
The first [[Hex]] treachery drawn each round by each investigator at New Moon Illusionist's location and each connecting [[Woods]] location gains surge.
While New Moon Illusionist is exhausted, it loses aloof.

cards.flavor: It's not a tiger, so what the hell is it?
cards.name: Circus Predator
cards.text: Hunter. Spawn - Any [[Woods]] location. Forced - After Circus Predator moves from a [[Woods]] location to another [[Woods]] location: It gets +1 horror until the end of the round.

cards.name: Feral Impulses
cards.text: Revelation - Put Feral Impulses into play next to the agenda deck. Forced - When the mythos phase begins: Each investigator with 1 or more tokens sealed on their investigator card chooses and discards an asset they control. Discard Feral Impulses. (Max once per round.)

cards.flavor: "Wait, maybe it was the other way."
cards.name: Moonlight Illusion
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] or [agility] (3). This test gets +1 difficulty for each token sealed on investigator cards at your location. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location and move to a connecting [[Woods]] location.

cards.flavor: An actual bear would be welcome at this point.
cards.name: Ursine Brute
cards.text: Hunter. Spawn - Any [[Woods]] location. Forced - After Ursine Brute takes 1 or more damage: Ready it.

cards.name: Harm's Way
cards.text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X.  X is equal to half the number of [[Bystander]] cards in the victory display (rounded up).
[cultist]: -3.  If you have not moved this round, choose and discard a card from your hand or lose a resource (choose one).
[tablet]: -3.  If you have moved this round, choose and discard a card from your hand or lose a resource (choose one).
[elder_thing]: -2.  If you fail, reveal a fury token.

cards.name: Harm's Way
cards.text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X.  X is equal to 1 + half the number of [[Bystander]] cards in the victory display (rounded up).
[cultist]: -4.  If you have not moved this round, choose and discard a card from your hand or lose a resource (choose one).
[tablet]: -4.  If you have moved this round, choose and discard a card from your hand or lose a resource (choose one).
[elder_thing]: -4.  If you fail, reveal a fury token.

cards.flavor: Although the monsters stir, the majority of the camp still rests from their night of horrors.  You hope you can make quick progress before anyone notices your interference, or worse yet, the monstrous creatures grow more active.
cards.name: The Circus Sleeps
cards.text: Forced - After doom is placed on this agenda, if there is an even number of doom on the agenda: Reveal a fury token.

cards.name: Restless Night
cards.text:
The colossal monsters shift again, snapping at anything that strays close enough, including each other. The more active they become, the greater the risks will grow.
Add a token to the fury bag.

cards.flavor: It's a slight consolation that as the monsters thrash and growl, their commotion covers for your own subterfuge.  It's still not something you can rely upon.
cards.name: Treading on Eggshells
cards.text: Forced - After doom is placed on this agenda, if there is an even number of doom on the agenda: Reveal a fury token.

cards.name: Midnight Snacking
cards.text:
Another baying howl -- warped, but like a wolf's -- rattles across the camp, and the writhing forms of the monsters grow more restless.
Add a token to the fury bag.

cards.flavor: You have to get out quickly, or you'll be at the top of the dinner menu when the monsters fully awaken!
cards.name: Sleep When You're Dead
cards.text: Forced - After doom is placed on this agenda, if there is an even number of doom on the agenda: Reveal a fury token.

cards.name: Reined In
cards.text:
An ominous feeling rises around the camp, and you glance with dread off into the woods. Sylvester Blake has returned, walking slowly but with a quiet fury. The ringmaster's very appearance has darkened, leaving him little more than a silhouette against the moonlight. A voice calls out, but it's not the voice you heard at his departure. It is raw and guttural, spouting words not of this earth. The towering monsters rise at the first utterance, descending on you with terrifying speed. You flee for your life back into the woods, weathering blows and unnatural cries.
Each investigator who has not resigned is defeated and suffers a physical or mental trauma (choose one).

cards.flavor: The people abducted from the circus are held prisoner throughout the camp.  It will be up to you to find and rescue them, as is the decision of when to escape.  Better to save some rather than none, if things should grow hopeless.
cards.name: Escape Act (v.I)
cards.text: Objective - The investigators may advance at any time. (Be ready to make your escape!)

cards.name: Under Suspicion
cards.text:
With time pressing, you have to make a clean getaway while you're still healthy and sane enough to do so. From the looks of it, your rapid success at the circus earlier gave Blake some idea of your capabilities.
Remove each copy of Kidnapped Citizen in play from the game (including ones flipped to their story card sides). Reveal a fury token. If you reveal a token, ignore it and reveal another token. Instead of resolving the effects on The Dark Young Stir... story card, put Camp Outskirts (Guarded Closely) into play adjacent to a [[Camp]] location corresponding to the direction of the revealed token. (ex. the [skull] token would place the location above the top copy of Crowded Row). Return each fury token to the fury bag.

cards.flavor: The people abducted from the circus are held prisoner throughout the camp.  It will be up to you to find and rescue them, as is the decision of when to escape.  Better to save some rather than none, if things should grow hopeless.
cards.name: Escape Act (v.II)
cards.text: Objective - The investigators may advance at any time. (Be ready to make your escape!)

cards.name: Under Their Noses
cards.text:
With time pressing, you have to make a clean getaway while you're still healthy and sane enough to do so. From the looks of it, Blake is feeling confident about his superiority and hasn't been especially careful.
Remove each copy of Kidnapped Citizen in play from the game (including ones flipped to their story card sides). Reveal a fury token. If you reveal a token, ignore it and reveal another token. Instead of resolving the effects on The Dark Young Stir... story card, put Camp Outskirts (Quiet, For Now) into play adjacent to a [[Camp]] location corresponding to the direction of the revealed token. (ex. the [skull] token would place the location above the top copy of Crowded Row). Return each fury token to the fury bag.

cards.flavor: With the arrangement of the camp, only one avenue will allow you to escape unnoticed with all the rescued captives in tow.  Work quickly and quietly, and freedom is yours.
cards.name: Overdue Departure
cards.text: [reaction] After you evade or defeat an enemy at Camp Outskirts: Discover a clue from Camp Outskirts. Objective - If each undefeated investigator is at Camp Outskirts and there are no clues on it, advance.

cards.name: Into the Woods
cards.text:
With all safeguards removed, you hurriedly usher the freed citizens ahead of you, instructing them to make straight north toward the dim lights of Arkham.
(→R2)

cards.flavor:
You can't understand most of the eldritch books,
but there may be some useful information here regardless.
cards.name: Ringmaster's Trailer
cards.text: [action]: Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3) to search through Blake's occult library.  If you succeed, draw 2 cards.  If you fail, take 1 horror.  (Limit once per round.)

cards.flavor:
Ironically, it's the safest place in
the circus encampment right now.
cards.name: Ringmaster's Trailer

cards.flavor: Careful not to be too obvious about your investigations.
cards.name: Crowded Row
cards.text: Forced - After you succeed at investigating this location by 3 or more: Place 1 doom on the nearest non-[[Elite]] enemy.

cards.flavor:
The resting performers cluster together here,
making movement a tricky prospect.
cards.name: Crowded Row

cards.flavor: Here in the heart of the enemy, they're at their strongest.
cards.name: Crowded Row
cards.text: Forced - After a non-[[Elite]] enemy enters this location: It gets +1 fight and +1 evade until the end of the round.

cards.flavor:
The resting performers cluster together here,
making movement a tricky prospect.
cards.name: Crowded Row

cards.flavor: The further you delve, the more promising the results.
cards.name: Crowded Row
cards.text: [reaction] When you initiate an investigation attempt at this location: Crowded Row gets +3 shroud value for this attempt.  If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue.  (Limit once per round.)

cards.flavor:
The resting performers cluster together here,
making movement a tricky prospect.
cards.name: Crowded Row

cards.flavor: Give them the slip, and they'll lead you right to the captives.
cards.name: Crowded Row
cards.text: [reaction] After you evade an enemy at this location: Take an investigate action. (Limit once per round.)

cards.flavor:
The resting performers cluster together here,
making movement a tricky prospect.
cards.name: Crowded Row

cards.flavor: They can't hunt you down if they can't find you.
cards.name: Secluded Tent
cards.text: [action] Place 1 of your clues on Secluded Tent: Non-[[Elite]] enemies at other locations cannot target you while resolving the hunter keyword until the end of the round.  (Limit once per round.)

cards.flavor:
These tents may be more isolated and quiet,
but there may also be more danger lurking within.
cards.name: Secluded Tent

the enormous monsters looming nearby.

The moon may lend you a great advantage
in the darkened tents.

These tents may be more isolated and quiet,

You must take advantage of the moonlight

cards.flavor: The circus took every precaution here.

cards.flavor: A few short hours ago, you had trouble finding your way in.  Now, you have the opposite problem.
